body.p:
Louisville 10th May 1861
To His Excy B. Magoffin

their is a petition in your office for the Remission of a fine against Henry Stickrod for $50,00/100 He Says that you promised his friends that you would Remit the fine as he has heard nothing from them he Request me to ask your Excy to Remit it if it has not Bein done His petition is Signed by some of the best friends you have and the best citizens of the city I can verry cherfully Recomend Stickrod to your consideration and his case as one Deserving of Executive clemency

To His Excy
B Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky

Respite 12 Mo
B. M
Issd June 24
Louisville City Ct
$50. } Misd.
H. Stickwood
